segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, everything seems routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight filters through the divided window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman polishes the plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the overflow from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down, soaking the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, a hazard waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes sit innocently nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy perches on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching for cookies, he holds a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below anticipates her reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is unstable and tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside offers a peaceful contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a slippery tragedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
